thread.title: Gwen Stefani and Gavin Rossdale Reportedly Settle Their Divorce
thread.title_full: Gwen Stefani and Gavin Rossdale Reportedly Settle Their Divorce

title: Gwen Stefani and Gavin Rossdale Reportedly Settle Their Divorce
text:
Gwen Stefani and Gavin Rossdale Reportedly Settle Their Divorce Posted just a moment ago 
Art Streiber/NBC (LOS ANGELES) -- Gwen Stefani and Gavin Rossdale have reportedly reached a divorce settlement. 
Sources tell TMZ Stefani, 46, and Rossdale, 49, will share custody of their three children, with a 50-50 split in physical custody. However, Gavin will actually have the kids for a majority of the time, due to Stefani's touring schedule. 
The estranged couple didn't have a prenup, but Rossdale has reportedly agreed to take far less than the 50 percent he's entitled to under California law, presumably to reach a quick settlement, TMZ notes. 
The Voice coach Stefani filed for divorce from the Bush frontman this past August after 13 years of marriage. According to TMZ, the divorce should be finalized by the end of the year.
